title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Right now there is war between good and evil.Do not worry good always Will win no matter who will win or lose only you need to know that bad guys at the end always Will lose.Who's good ? Good Are honest loyal and right at least with their own people.Those who been betrayed Even their own people will be judged AS bad on god eyes.Anyways If you Are good you got nothing to worry about the bad ones need to worry about only.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: ^^^ Right!Evil people try to destroy the population. But they can't. Oh sure, maybe some small parts of it. But it keeps on growing, growing, growing... 'cause it's good.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 21, 2022, 08:23:47 PMRight now there is war between good and evil.Do not worry good always Will win no matter who will win or lose only you need to know that bad guys at the end always Will lose.Who's good ? Good Are honest loyal and right at least with their own people.Those who been betrayed Even their own people will be judged AS bad on god eyes.Anyways If you Are good you got nothing to worry about the bad ones need to worry about only.Sometime good people are frustrated because wicked people in the society seems not to be punished for their evil deeds. We see murderers, fraudsters, thieves and criminals moving freely, even when it is clear that they are guilty of these crimes. In fact, my society celebrates anybody that acquires riches regardless of the source of their funds. They are given the best position in government, honor in the society and best seats in religious settings. I have seen terrorists become legislature and thieves elected as governors.But these negative occurrences shouldn't stop us from becoming honest, loyal and trustworthy. We must learn to treat people the way we want to be treated. Evil may seems to be winning but good would conquer and defeat it. I am sure that one day everybody we would all give account of our activities on earth.

comments.author: Minecache
comments.body: Quote from: Zlantann on December 22, 2022, 02:06:19 AMQuote from: Fullbear2222 on December 21, 2022, 08:23:47 PMRight now there is war between good and evil.Do not worry good always Will win no matter who will win or lose only you need to know that bad guys at the end always Will lose.Who's good ? Good Are honest loyal and right at least with their own people.Those who been betrayed Even their own people will be judged AS bad on god eyes.Anyways If you Are good you got nothing to worry about the bad ones need to worry about only.Sometime good people are frustrated because wicked people in the society seems not to be punished for their evil deeds. We see murderers, fraudsters, thieves and criminals moving freely, even when it is clear that they are guilty of these crimes. In fact, my society celebrates anybody that acquires riches regardless of the source of their funds. They are given the best position in government, honor in the society and best seats in religious settings. I have seen terrorists become legislature and thieves elected as governors.But these negative occurrences shouldn't stop us from becoming honest, loyal and trustworthy. We must learn to treat people the way we want to be treated. Evil may seems to be winning but good would conquer and defeat it. I am sure that one day everybody we would all give account of our activities on earth.     This is what's happening in our world, the world is never fair. Those who work in government and work for judicial agencies are mostly liars and fraudsters, but by some force, they have become a justice. Given what is happening in the world today, I doubt that good will triumph over evil. But that's not why we have to become bad guys, let's live honestly and always help people, I still believe this world has cause and effect, it's just that it won't come as soon as we expect.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: People get frustrated over the fact that evil has more prevalence than good and as such think goodness is overrated. In our world, the bad ones are being celebrated and elevated into higher positions which force those who are good to join the "if you can't beat them, you join them" bandwagon. The act of being good and remaining good is like constantly pouring clean water into a bucketful of dirty water; eventually the water becomes clean!

comments.author: len01
comments.body: completely people who work as members of government councils are almost 100% liars and I say those people are evil like judging their own people with all the rules that seem to oppress their people.as in several cases the government made laws that opposed the opinion of its people but did not provide a solution to the public about suppressing these laws.and good people (society) can only surrender and always act well to survive.but lots of good people turn bad when their kindness is not appreciated and become losers, thieves etc, just to survive.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Good will always supersede evil no matter how long it takes to manifest. It's cool to be honest to yourself before others, we're in evil world and the only way to be special is to be good to people. Keep believing that good deeps will pay you forever while evil deeds are temporary.It's quite unfortunate that in this party of the world (Africa) we have poor educated men all round the street and rich criminal. Because of riches of the evil ones, good people has join them to be evil into go be rich through illegal means. I have always said to myself I rather die as a good poor man than die as evil man.  Ritual and love of money is at very high rate in Africa. We're in dangerous generation and the only way to escape is teach our children values and beliefs that's good.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Good must always prevail over evil just the way light will always overcome darkness, no matter the evil deeds happening in the society by evil men and nothing has happened to them yet doesn't mean that they are free from the nemeses of their evil deed,after sometime you will see them dying miserably and some mentally sick.Stay outstanding and support or do what is good and don't support evil,you will see that life will be very easy with you if you can endure. The love of money is leading the society into so many evil act especially the government bodies, they are the major promoter of evil deeds,that's is why the youths are learning from them.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 21, 2022, 08:23:47 PMRight now there is war between good and evil.Do not worry good always Will win no matter who will win or lose only you need to know that bad guys at the end always Will lose.Who's good ? Good Are honest loyal and right at least with their own people.Those who been betrayed Even their own people will be judged AS bad on god eyes.Anyways If you Are good you got nothing to worry about the bad ones need to worry about only.It's been ages since there's the war between the good and the bad. Sometimes, the situation isn't favoring the good. And that's why even if they're the good ones, they're frustrated of the outcome of a situation that they're in. It's because the bad ones are prevailing and taking the favor instead of the good ones. I know that everyone understands those type of situations and it just can't be helped and why there's the belief on the bad ones live longer.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: They is always a price for everything, Good and bad comes with a price. And people must be careful of the part they choose in life. Those who are good will definitely achieve peace of mind over their evil counterparts. Remember some things cannot be purchased with money just like peace. Additionally, money achieved the wrong way will definitely go the wrong way. That's why the fraudsters always lavish their money and most times go broke again. Nothing good comes easy, the good people must work hard to achieve their goals. The world would have been a failed place if they're no such people as good folks.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: God has promised this throughout the history, so if you are a believer, hold steady and do not fear any evil for that God is with you and truth and good will always win, the bad and evil will remain in shame and regret.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on December 23, 2022, 08:51:59 PMGod has promised this throughout the history, so if you are a believer, hold steady and do not fear any evil for that God is with you and truth and good will always win, the bad and evil will remain in shame and regret.Good will is naturally above evil, at times people make one do evil. People intend to pay back good will with evil. It's very annoying when you help or lend someone money and in return their cause problem before paying back. At times the lender arrest them just to get his money back. In such a case is good to do evil. But no matter what always think good and it's benefits before thinking evil. Good deeds pays

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Those who do good feel they're been cheated by those who are doing bad and at times feel they are wasting their efforts. But the hidden truth is, the act of doing good should not be done so one would be commended, hence it would be a wasted effort, but it should be a character trait. Because since other physical things can fade, a trait can't.

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: Yes only the good wins permanently, because the evil are already living temporally, the truth of the whole matters is that, if God is your alpha that means you will go far in life, no matter the evils that friends and family planed against us, everyone has his own self and have there own choices, but I just keep on praying that everyone should know the good from the bad because it has been so long we all heard about the coming of jesus christ, he might come at any seconds, if you're still that evil type why not be born again today?

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on December 24, 2022, 11:09:53 AM Those who do good feel they're been cheated by those who are doing bad and at times feel they are wasting their efforts. But the hidden truth is, the act of doing good should not be done so one would be commended, hence it would be a wasted effort, but it should be a character trait. Because since other physical things can fade, a trait can't.One thing I know for sure is that doing good pays,  the result may not be instant but in time coming. It is written that good name is better than riches, it is good to be good. It feels good when people know one is honest and straight forward in every agreement.  What people who are bad do should not be a reason to turn from being good to be bad . I know bad people always claim to be smart and see others to be less  or not being smart,  but one day they will definitely get consequences of bad deeds .

comments.author: CryptocurencyKing
comments.body: At times I wonder if we really need a winner in some contest. Like, no one likes to lose, everyone wants to win and that's what gives bet to competitions. Of course, there is a good, bad or evil in our world but, sometimes, it's always difficult to tell being on either side. Your interest becomes a reason why some probable course seems good or not.Let's look at the alphabet "M". Itsgot perspectives to it that would be understood depending on your positioning. Good enough we've got a judge for our deeds and that judge is our conscience. Once it's satisfactory enough for you, then for you, it might he satisfactory enough as good and that's good enough for you. When it isn't, you might just have to let go.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Quote from: CryptocurencyKing on December 26, 2022, 06:12:59 PMAt times I wonder if we really need a winner in some contest. Like, no one likes to lose, everyone wants to win and that's what gives bet to competitions. Of course, there is a good, bad or evil in our world but, sometimes, it's always difficult to tell being on either side. Your interest becomes a reason why some probable course seems good or not.Let's look at the alphabet "M". Itsgot perspectives to it that would be understood depending on your positioning. Good enough we've got a judge for our deeds and that judge is our conscience. Once it's satisfactory enough for you, then for you, it might he satisfactory enough as good and that's good enough for you. When it isn't, you might just have to let go. I'm impressed with your contributions, it's tells how good you are.  I have told my peers severally that good deeds are always good than evil no matter how long it takes to manifest. Some people want their good deeds to manifest immediately. But good things do take time to manifest.just like you said, once you're conscience is clear enough than you have nothing to prove of ur good deeds.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: It is quite terrible that we live in a society that devalues goodness and rewards evildoers. Why can't good people run a state or a nation? Why must it always be bad people, I keep asking myself. Does this imply that the world is once more unkind to sincere people? How much longer will the decent people have to wait for good to triumph over evil?These were the thoughts that would cross my head day in and day out. I do want to discover solutions because right now, good people frequently endure harsher punishment than evil ones.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Marykeller on December 29, 2022, 12:38:46 PMIt is quite terrible that we live in a society that devalues goodness and rewards evildoers. Why can't good people run a state or a nation? Why must it always be bad people, I keep asking myself. Does this imply that the world is once more unkind to sincere people? How much longer will the decent people have to wait for good to triumph over evil?These were the thoughts that would cross my head day in and day out. I do want to discover solutions because right now, good people frequently endure harsher punishment than evil ones.Good people would run the state or nation if they hadn't been tricked into financing the elite through the banking system loan practices.Now that the elite have so much money, they do with it whatever they want. And you know the old Bible saying, "He who loves money never has money enough."That's what it is all about... more money... for what? Can't eat it.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Let everyone continue to do what he's best at because there's always a time that comes for it recompense, but it is advisable to do good and shun evil because no one will ever want to reap the evil deeds he had done in the past, we must always learn to first put ourselves in the shoe of every action we are about to take, this will help us condition them towards our direction if we are in that same place and such is been acted upon, live is very short and has it uptrust that whatsoever thing you throws at it that same get back to you.
